mapper.select: /* staffClaimMapper.selectTaxCodeStaffClaimFlag */ SELECT TAX_CODE , INDUSTRY_CODE||' '||'('||TAX_NAME||')' AS TAX_NAME FROM FCM0007C WHERE STAFF_CLM_FLAG = 'X'

/* staffClaimMapper.selectNextClmNo */ SELECT 'J4' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CLM_NO FROM FCM0019M WHERE SUBSTR (CLM_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') AND CLM_TYPE = 'J4'
mapper.insert: /* staffClaimMapper.insertStaffClaimExp */ INSERT INTO FCM0019M ( CLM_NO ,CLM_TYPE ,COST_CENTR ,COST_CENTR_NAME ,MEM_ACC_ID ,BANK_CODE ,BANK_ACC_NO ,CLM_MONTH ,TOT_AMT ,APPV_PRCSS_NO ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ) values ( #{clmNo} ,'J4' ,UPPER(#{costCentr}) ,NVL(#{costCentrName}, (SELECT COST_CENTER_TEXT FROM FCM0008M WHERE COST_CENTER = UPPER(#{costCentr}))) ,UPPER(#{memAccId}) ,#{bankCode} ,#{bankAccNo} ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{clmMonth}, 'MM/YYYY'), 'YYYYMM') ,#{allTotAmt} ,#{appvPrcssNo} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} )
mapper.select: /* staffClaimMapper.selectNextClmSeq */ SELECT NVL(MAX(CLM_SEQ) + 1, 1) AS CLM_SEQ FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}

/* staffClaimMapper.selectStaffClaimItems */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, /*T4.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR,*/ T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIR_NAME, T1.INVC_TYPE, ( CASE T1.INVC_TYPE WHEN 'F' THEN 'Full Tax invoice' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Simplified Tax invoice' END ) AS INVC_TYPE_NAME, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, T2.TAX_NAME, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.EXP_DESC, '(^[[:space:]]+)|([[:space:]]+$)', NULL) EXP_DESC, T1.CLAM_UN, T1.EXP_GRP, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO /* LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME */ WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} ORDER BY T1.CLM_SEQ

/* staffClaimMapper.selectStaffClaimInfo */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T4.MEM_ACC_NAME, T3.BANK_CODE, T4.BANK_NAME, T3.BANK_ACC_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T3.CLM_MONTH, 'YYYYMM'), 'MM/YYYY') AS CLM_MONTH, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T1.EXP_GRP, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, /*T5.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR,*/ T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIR_NAME, T1.INVC_TYPE, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.EXP_DESC, '(^[[:space:]]+)|([[:space:]]+$)', NULL) EXP_DESC FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T3.MEM_ACC_ID = T4.MEM_ACC_ID /* LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T5 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T4.MEM_ACC_NAME */ WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND T1.CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}

/* staffClaimMapper.selectStaffClaimInfoForAppv */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T3.COST_CENTR, T3.COST_CENTR_NAME, T3.MEM_ACC_ID, T4.MEM_ACC_NAME, T3.BANK_CODE, T4.BANK_NAME, T3.BANK_ACC_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T3.CLM_MONTH, 'YYYYMM'), 'MM/YYYY') AS CLM_MONTH, T3.TOT_AMT AS ALL_TOT_AMT, T1.EXP_GRP, T3.APPV_PRCSS_NO, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, /*T5.MEM_ACC_ID AS SUPPLIR,*/ T1.SUPPLIR AS SUPPLIER, (CASE T1.INVC_TYPE WHEN 'F' THEN 'Full Tax invoice' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Simplified Tax invoice' END ) AS INVC_TYPE, T1.INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(T1.INVC_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INVC_DT, T1.GST_RGIST_NO, T1.TAX_CODE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.EXP_DESC, '(^[[:space:]]+)|([[:space:]]+$)', NULL) EXP_DESC FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0019M T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T4 ON T3.MEM_ACC_ID = T4.MEM_ACC_ID /* LEFT JOIN FCM0006M T5 ON T1.SUPPLIR = T5.MEM_ACC_NAME */ WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND T1.CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}

/* staffClaimMapper.selectStaffClaimItemGrp */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T1.TAX_CODE, T2.TAX_NAME, T2.TAX_RATE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.CLAM_UN, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T3.CAR_MILAG_DT, T3.LOC_FROM, T3.LOC_TO, T3.CAR_MILAG, T3.CAR_MILAG_AMT, T3.TOLL_AMT, T3.PARKING_AMT, T3.PURPOSE, REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.EXP_DESC, '(^[[:space:]]+)|([[:space:]]+$)', NULL) EXP_DESC FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0021D T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO AND T1.CLM_SEQ = T3.CLM_SEQ WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLAM_UN = #{clamUn}

/* staffClaimMapper.selectStaffClaimItemGrpForAppv */
SELECT T1.CLM_SEQ, T1.EXP_TYPE, T1.EXP_TYPE_NAME, T1.GL_ACC_CODE, T1.GL_ACC_CODE_NAME, T1.BUDGET_CODE, T1.BUDGET_CODE_NAME, T1.TAX_CODE, NVL2(T1.TAX_CODE, T2.INDUSTRY_CODE||' '||'('||T2.TAX_NAME||')', '') AS TAX_NAME, T2.TAX_RATE, 'MYR' AS CUR, T1.NET_AMT AS GST_BEFOR_AMT, T1.TAX_AMT AS GST_AMT, T1.TAX_NON_CLM_AMT, T1.TOT_AMT, T1.CLAM_UN, T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, T3.CAR_MILAG_DT, T3.LOC_FROM, T3.LOC_TO, T3.CAR_MILAG, T3.CAR_MILAG_AMT, T3.TOLL_AMT, T3.PARKING_AMT, T3.PURPOSE, REGEXP_REPLACE(T1.EXP_DESC, '(^[[:space:]]+)|([[:space:]]+$)', NULL) EXP_DESC FROM FCM0020D T1 LEFT JOIN FCM0007C T2 ON T1.TAX_CODE = T2.TAX_CODE LEFT JOIN FCM0021D T3 ON T1.CLM_NO = T3.CLM_NO AND T1.CLM_SEQ = T3.CLM_SEQ WHERE T1.CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLAM_UN = #{clamUn}

/* staffClaimMapper.selectAttachList */ SELECT T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T2.ATCH_FILE_NAME FROM SYS0070M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D T2 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_ID = T2.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId} ORDER BY T1.ATCH_FILE_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId}
mapper.delete: /* staffClaimMapper.deleteStaffClaimExpItem */ DELETE FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}
/* staffClaimMapper.deleteStaffClaimExpMileage */ DELETE FROM FCM0021D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} AND CLM_SEQ = #{clmSeq}
mapper.update: /* staffClaimMapper.updateStaffClaimExpTotAmt */ UPDATE FCM0019M SET TOT_AMT = #{allTotAmt} WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
mapper.select: /* staffClaimMapper.checkOnceAMonth */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT E.CLM_TYPE, E.CLM_MONTH, E.MEM_ACC_ID FROM FCM0019M E JOIN FCM0004M A ON E.APPV_PRCSS_NO = A.APPV_PRCSS_NO AND E.CLM_NO = A.APPV_REQ_KEY_NO AND E.CLM_TYPE = SUBSTR(A.APPV_REQ_KEY_NO, 0, 2) WHERE A.APPV_PRCSS_STUS != 'J') T WHERE T.CLM_TYPE = #{clmType} AND T.CLM_MONTH = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{clmMonth}, 'MM/YYYY'), 'YYYYMM') AND T.MEM_ACC_ID = #{memAccId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FCM0019M ( CLM_NO ,CLM_TYPE ,COST_CENTR ,COST_CENTR_NAME ,MEM_ACC_ID ,BANK_CODE ,BANK_ACC_NO ,CLM_MONTH ,TOT_AMT ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ,PREV_CLM_NO ) SELECT #{newClmNo} ,CLM_TYPE ,UPPER(COST_CENTR) ,COST_CENTR_NAME ,UPPER(MEM_ACC_ID) ,BANK_CODE ,BANK_ACC_NO ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') ,TOT_AMT ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} ,#{clmNo} FROM FCM0019M WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FCM0020D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo} ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS0071D ( ATCH_FILE_ID , ATCH_FILE_NAME , FILE_SUB_PATH , PHYSICL_FILE_NAME , FILE_EXTSN , FILE_SIZE , FILE_PASSWORD ) SELECT #{newAtchFileId} ,ATCH_FILE_NAME ,FILE_SUB_PATH ,PHYSICL_FILE_NAME ,FILE_EXTSN ,FILE_SIZE ,FILE_PASSWORD FROM SYS0071D WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}

INSERT INTO FCM0021D ( CLM_NO ,CLM_SEQ ,CAR_MILAG_DT ,LOC_FROM ,LOC_TO ,CAR_MILAG ,CAR_MILAG_AMT ,TOLL_AMT ,PARKING_AMT ,PURPOSE ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ,UPD_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ) SELECT #{newClmNo} ,CLM_SEQ ,CAR_MILAG_DT ,LOC_FROM ,LOC_TO ,CAR_MILAG ,CAR_MILAG_AMT ,TOLL_AMT ,PARKING_AMT ,PURPOSE ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} ,SYSDATE ,#{userId} FROM FCM0021D WHERE CLM_NO = #{clmNo}
